Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 5 Upādinnattika » 5.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra » 5.5.2 Paccayapaccanīya
Nahetu
Upādinnattika
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Nahetu
49.
2596Upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho upādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  ahetukaṃ upādinnupādāniyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā; ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
2597Anupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  ahetukaṃ anupādinnupādāniyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā; vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṃsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2598Nahetuyā dve, na adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  navippayutte tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2599Paccanīyaṃ
